EmailTemplate.description: US-0006467 Contract confirmation for FVF & Coupon
EmailTemplate.name: Contract confirmation for FVF
EmailTemplate.subject: FVF contract has been signed by {!Final_Value_Fee_FVF__c.Seller_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Final_Value_Fee_FVF__c.Requestor__c},
This email is to inform you that FVF contract has been signed by a {!Final_Value_Fee_FVF__c.Seller_Name__c}.
Click here to view the details: {!Final_Value_Fee_FVF__c.Link}.
Thank you, HIVE team
